summary: A bittersweet and intimate look at friendship, love and growing up. The easy life of summertime in Myrtle Beach is turned upside down for one local girl when two strangers come to town: a beautiful temptress and a charming drifter.
cast: Lauren Ambrose|Jennifer Dundas|Joelle Carter|Jamie Harrold|James Villemaire|Josh Pais|Sharon Scruggs|Joshua Harto|Anthony Ruivivar|Russ Ferrari|Jeremy Clark|Joe Roseto|Jeffrey Ware|Todd A. Kovner|David Raeford-Davis|Summer Still|Benny Lamar Wheeler|Frank Trimble|Carlene Moore|Mary Beth Brown|Bryn Blankinship|Gregory Porter Miller|Dennis L.A. White|Adam Avagliano|Kevin Kane|Travis Sharp
title: Swimming
